snippet.title: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced (V2.1 Out Now!)
snippet.description:
The original Kaizo Mario Galaxy was released in 2018 to lots of praise, but also lots of criticism. For the past year and a half, I have been working on this massive update that addresses almost all previous issues, bugs, confusion, etc.

If you played the original, I hope you'll consider giving this version a try!

Download Kaizo Mario Galaxy Rebalanced:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/vmfhr5y7v5ngoxl/KaizoMarioGalaxyRebalanced_V2.1.zip/file

Remix by Risty!
https://youtu.be/Kah1V48yYqQ

This trailer was featured in F3 2023!
https://youtu.be/Up6ocnxhQC8

If you still want to play the original version of Kaizo Mario Galaxy, you can download it here:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/3xn7ikhf0981iue/KaizoMarioGalaxyLegacyEdition.zip/file
(It has been updated to V1.3 with a new name, and V1.2 is no longer be available for download.)

Join my discord server!
https://discord.com/invite/tqGaskj58W
